tagline: Store and share your personal documents — safely.
subtitle: Invoices, prescriptions, and important files in one trusted place.

servicesBody: Save, update, and share your files with confidence — from prescriptions to everyday documents.
servicePrescriptionBody: Store and update prescriptions, then share them with doctors when needed. Add a quick voice note for context.
serviceDocumentBody: Keep invoices, reports, IDs, and PDFs organized — and share a link when you choose.
serviceOtherBody: Upload photos or any important file, track versions, and share securely.
planBody: A simple free plan to start — with clear limits and transparent ads.
freePlanBody: Up to 100MB storage. Ads help keep the service running.
privacyBody: You control what you upload and what you share. No manual storage of credentials in the browser.
aboutBody: DocSpot helps you keep important personal documents in one place, ready to share when you need them.
contactBody: Contact options will be added here soon (email/support).

aboutPrivacyNote: Personal identifiers (phone, SSN, banking details) are not displayed publicly.
